job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: ltstronggtltugtWhat You Will Be Doingltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgt ltligtResponsible for working with users and Product Managers to address customer needs by formulating machine learning and artificial intelligence solutionsltligt ltligtUtilize software engineering and data science skills to collaborate with UXUI teammates on the usability of datadriven product features and assess needs and solutions for largescale data infrastructureltligt ltligtDrive the technical delivery of dataset creation experimentation prototyping implementation testing deployment monitoring and continuous improvementltligt ltligtApplication of machine learning technologies to novel problems in the domains of software operations and securityltligt ltligtRequire the customization of machine learning models in order to generate useful insights across heterogeneous customer datasets as well as the design and implementation of production software services to deploy and deliver these models to the customers andltligt ltligtOwn the uptime and reliability of machine learningrelated services and capabilitiesltligt ltbrgtltbrgtltulgtltstronggtltugtRequirementsltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtltstronggtWhat we need from youltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtMasters degree or foreign equivalent in Computer Science Computer Engineering Information Technology or a related field and two 2 years of experience as a Machine Learning Engineer Software Engineer or in a related roleltbrgtltulgt ltligtWork experience withltligt ltligtObjectoriented programming experience in Java Scala Ruby or Cltligt ltligtMachine learningstatisticsltligt ltligtSoftware engineering of productiongrade servicesltligt ltligtSoftware data related to operations and security andltligt ltligtValidate Machine Learning models on different platformsltligtltulgt
